articles.author: Megan Specia, Victoria Kim
articles.title: Russia-Ukraine War: Latest News and Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: President Biden is wrapping up a three-day visit to Europe, where he has met with NATO and other allies in an effort to bolster their unity over Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. Russia’s Defense Ministry signaled a possible shift in its military aims.
articles.content: Russia signaled a possible recalibration of its war aims in Ukraine on Friday as the Kremlin faced spreading global ostracism for the brutal invasion, hardened Western economic punishments and a dete… [+11119 chars]

articles.author: Ricci Rox
articles.title: OnePlus 10 Pro pricing leaks ahead of March 31 global launch - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The OnePlus 10 Pro finally got a global launch date a few days ago, and a new leak has now revealed pricing information for the flagship phone in Europe. It appears, thankfully, that the OnePlus 10 Pro will maintain the pricing of its predecessor.
articles.content: A few days ago, OnePlus finally announced the global launch date for its upcoming premium phone, the OnePlus 10 Pro. The flagship will debut on March 31 globally, and a new leak has now provided pric… [+702 chars]

articles.author: Maegan Vazquez, CNN
articles.title: Biden to meet with Polish President, visit refugees and issue 'major address' on final day of Europe trip - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Saturday is taking part in his final stop on a last-minute trip to Europe aimed at synchronizing how Western allies will address Russia's war with Ukraine and reassure nations that they have the support of the United States.

articles.title: P&O ferry the European Causeway detained over safety concerns after 'failures' training new crew - Sky News
articles.content:
A P&O ferry has been detained in Northern Ireland on safety grounds - just days after 800 workers were sacked without notice and replaced with cheaper workers.

articles.author: CNBCTV18.com
articles.title: More transmissible Omicron sub-variant BA.2 driving infections in US; what we know so far - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The new Omicron sub-variant, BA.2 is spreading in northeastern US, China, Hong Kong and Europe. BA.2 is a new sub-variant of the Omicron strain of the SARS-CoV-2 virus. Globally, the sub-variant accounts for about 86 percent of cases reported between February…
